name: HackQuest
fullText:
The @0G_CN x @Hackquest_ Technical Writing Contest is live! 🐼 📝

⚡ Dive into AI × Web3 × 0G Tech
💰 Prize pool ¥2000 RMB + exclusive 0G merch
🏆 5 winners will be selected
✨ Shortlisted works get community spotlight

Submit by Sept 15 👇
https://t.co/pxNDdPjFMo https://t.co/4Cw7ZWmjGh

name: Colosseum
fullText:
Colosseum's VC fund is allocating $2.5+ million in pre-seed capital to @Solana Cypherpunk Hackathon winners.

The competition kicks off on September 25 and will run through October, 30 2025.

Sign up today to get notified about additional hackathon tracks, sponsors, and more! https://t.co/c9uifbcSdd

name: OpenBuild
fullText:
Are L2s really secured by Ethereum? 🤔

Dive into this critical debate, explore the evolution of crypto narratives, and get the details on Arbitrum's new DRIP incentive program in OpenBuild Dev Digest #66.

Plus, the Avalanche GameLoop and BUIDL with REACT hackathons just kicked https://t.co/pHKuraoZN7
